#summary How to add contacts.
#labels Phase-Support

= Add Contact =

There are three ways for adding contacts.<br>
1. File->Add contact.<br>
 1.1. Address: Here you can write the tor id of your contact.<br>
 1.2. Display name: Here you can write the name/nickname of your contact.<br>
<br>
2. File->Request buddies. This menu entry automaticly searches for new jTorChat users.
<br>
<br>
3. File->Settings->Buddy sync<br>
 3.1. URL to Buddylist: Tell JTC with which buddylist you want to sync.<br>
 3.2. Sync: If you click here all the buddies from the file will be added.<br>
 3.3. sync at every start: if you check this it add the buddies from file at every start. at least if not yet added.
